title: 2021 Laver Cup
description:
The 2021 Laver Cup will be the fourth edition of the Laver Cup, a men's tennis tournament between teams from Europe and the rest of the world. It will be held on indoor hard courts at the TD Garden in Boston, United States from 24 until 26 September.
It was originally scheduled for September 2020, but postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic to avoid overlapping with the 2020 French Open, which was rescheduled for 20 September to 4 October.
Team Europe captain Björn Borg and Team World captain John McEnroe will reprise their roles as captains.
Team Europe will attempt to win the title for a fourth consecutive edition.
